mapper.select: select p.id,p.pictures_address,p.update_time,p.views,u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,p.comment_count,p.liked from pictures p join user u on p.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId};

select p.id,p.pictures_address,p.title,p.content,p.update_time,p.views,p.comment_count, u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,u_d.grade user_dask_grade from pictures p join user u on p.user_id = u.id join user_dask u_d where p.id = #{id} and u.id = #{userId};

select p.id,p.pictures_address,p.update_time,p.views,u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id,p.comment_count,p.liked from pictures p join user u on p.user_id = u.id where (p.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')) or (p.content like concat('%',#{title},'%'));
select p.id,p.pictures_address,p.title,p.content,p.update_time,p.views, u.nick_name user_nick_name,u.id user_id from pictures p join user u on p.user_id = u.id where p.id = #{id};
